reviewDescription: The Speaker and Karaoke Mic is an excellent gadget for both casual and party use. The speaker delivers crisp sound with impressive bass, while the mic ensures clear vocal pickup, making it ideal for karaoke nights. Its user-friendly design, wireless connectivity, and long battery life enhance portability and convenience. Overall, it’s a great value for bringing music and fun to any gathering.

Unlike most chinese products this doesn't have noise during silence period. Pretty good. It doesn't have isolated volume control, but the buttons operate the phones volume only.  The tricky part is the volume control operates both volume and forward-reverse. So operating it is a frustrating experience.Coming to mic, it is decent too, though i don't use effects, but there is a inbuilt echo (it's a feature it seems) ,which cannot be turned off.Mix has its own volume control.

reviewTitle: amazing speaker, loved it, the karaoke mic is awesome, 100 % recommended
reviewDescription: Awesome speakers, amazing output and mic with voice changing options is great, loved the design and build quality of the speaker, easy to carry because of the grab handle given, the karaoke output is great, battery lasts long for about 5 hours, multiple connectivity options available, overall great product 10 out of 10 recommended, must have for everyone

I absolutely love the Portronics Apollo One speaker! The sound quality is impressive for its size, and the bass is surprisingly good. The wireless karaoke mic with voice-changing effects is such a fun addition, making it perfect for parties or casual karaoke nights. The RGB lights are a nice touch, creating a vibrant atmosphere. The battery lasts around 5 hours, which is great for a portable speaker. It’s easy to carry around thanks to the convenient handle. Overall, an amazing product for the price. Highly recommend it!
Not worth for 1350rs

The Portronics Apollo One speaker delivers impressive sound with 20W power and deep bass. The wireless karaoke mic is a fun addition, and the RGB LED lights enhance the experience. With Bluetooth V5.3, Type-C charging, and versatile connectivity options, it’s a great portable speaker with 5 hours of playtime.

     The speaker is over all quite good , the build quality is okish not excellent but neither bad. Coming to sound the audio clarity is crystal clear unfortunately I personally found the bass (which I needed) to be lacking. Backup is 5 hours should have been more considering the size. The mic provided for karaoke is also good ,but you have to hold it in a certain angle for the mic to detect your voice. Would have given it 4 stars if bass was good but it's ok for someone who wants to do meeting on big halls or some yoga or other stuffs , not exactly for bass lovers

reviewTitle: Best portable speaker for karoke lovers
reviewDescription: This is best in class karoke speaker which can be a perfect use for party like small functions (birthday, anniversary, etc.) Its sound is superb perfectly audible  for a range of 15 mtr  and has a long battery life.
